content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name). I'm a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
Wow, that's a lot of schools! I've only been to two schools.
Yeah, it's been a lot of moving around. But it's also given me the chance to meet a lot of different people and learn about different cultures.
That's a good way to look at it. I can see how it would be a good way to meet new people.
Yeah, it is. I've made a lot of friends over the years.
That's great. I'm glad you've been able to make friends wherever you've moved to.
Thanks. I'm a pretty social person, so I make friends easily.
That's good. I'm not as social as you are, but I'm working on it.
Well, you're doing a good job so far. We're getting along just fine, aren't we?
Yeah, I think we are.
Great! I'm glad to hear that.
Me too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go walking on the beach. I live close to the coast, so I can do it whenever I want.
That sounds nice. I love the beach. I used to go kayaking at the lake on weekends when I lived in Illinois.
Kayaking sounds fun! I've never tried it before.
You should! It's a lot of fun. You get to be out on the water and enjoy the scenery.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd like it.
Thanks for the suggestion. I'll keep it in mind.
No problem.
